name: sri2db
description: This is a module to sync any SRI interface to one or more database tables in a postgres 9.4 instance

scripts.pretest: (./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres cleanup 'sri2db_test_postgres' || echo 'No postgres cleanup needed') && (./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils mssql cleanup 'sri2db_test_mssql' || echo 'No mssql cleanup needed') && ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres start 'sri2db_test_postgres' 25432 ./docker/postgres_initdb && ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils mssql start 'sri2db_test_mssql' 21433 ./docker/mssql_initdb
scripts.test: ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha.js; echo Mocha has finished; ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres stop 'sri2db_test_postgres' && ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils mssql stop 'sri2db_test_mssql'
scripts.posttest: (./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres cleanup 'sri2db_test_postgres' || echo 'No postgres cleanup needed') && (./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils mssql cleanup 'sri2db_test_mssql' || echo 'No mssql cleanup needed')

author: Frederik Tilkin
